@mDevStix @ShopTalkShow When Netlify runs your build, it sees the Form elements & creates an API for you, complete with data storage and access to get that data programmatically or through the admin interface. Auth is a little more complex. @biilmann describes it in this video: https://t.co/sDoy1LoTe1
